definition: to hold up (as an model)/to hold in esteem/to revere/to advocate

sentences.english: Advocate white is vogue, people need is involute medium halcyon.
sentences.chinese: 崇尚白色是时尚，人们需要纷乱中的宁静。

sentences.english: I am willing to be a good housewife even if I always enjoy modern point of view.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我崇尚前卫思想，可我愿意做个好主妇呢。

sentences.english: Things for the Chinese people and selfless advocate, it is interpersonal harmony.
sentences.chinese: 中国人崇尚天下为公和心底无私，故人际关系融洽。

sentences.english: Advocate the Zhao Yixue of development is extremely happy showing person.
sentences.chinese: 崇尚发展的赵以学是个极其乐现的人。

sentences.english: The company advocates the philosophy of "people-oriented, moving forward with times, innovation and development".
sentences.chinese: 公司崇尚“以人为本”，与时俱进，开拓创新。

sentences.english: Too often, we honor swagger and bluster and the wielders of force.
sentences.chinese: 我们往往予以认同崇尚暴力和狂妄自大的人。

sentences.english: In politics,they advocate centrism with over ten-years marriage and children.
sentences.chinese: 在政治上她们崇尚中间路线，结婚十年以上，有孩子。

sentences.english: A society paying too much respect to heroism can't be very peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 一个崇尚个人英雄主义的国家，社会必然是不安宁的。

sentences.english: These are movements away from true spirit-filled religion in his view.
sentences.chinese: 他的观点也有些活动，远离崇尚精神的宗教。

sentences.english: Han Zhen is an important successor and disseminator of nature view of Taizhou school.
sentences.chinese: 韩贞是泰州学派崇尚自然思想的重要继承者和传播者。

sentences.english: Speaking personally I am glad to be a heroic man.
sentences.chinese: 就个人而言，鄙人崇尚英豪。

sentences.english: The ecological environment ethics upholds the harmonious co-prosperity and coordinated development of human and the natural environment.
sentences.chinese: 生态环境道德崇尚人与自然环境和谐共荣，协调发展。

sentences.english: In the era of fitness and health worship, people have become obsessed with exercise and dieting.
sentences.chinese: 在崇尚健康的时代，人们暖衷于体育运动和健康饮食。

sentences.english: Such sofa suits to advocate to reside the personage of a style rustically however oneself most.
sentences.chinese: 这样的沙发最适合崇尚自然而朴素的居家风格的人士。

sentences.english: Norwegians pride themselves on the openness of their society and cherish the idea of free expression.
sentences.chinese: 挪威人以他们的社会开发性而自豪，并崇尚言论自由。

definition: to esteem/to think highly of/to accord importance to/to revere
to stress/to emphasize/particular about sth/to strive for
to advocate/to initiate/to propose/to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)
to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
to be in vogue/to be prevalent
to pay particular attention to/carefully selected for quality/tastefully chosen
to believe firmly/devout in one's faith
